website_summaries.verdict: A nice auxiliary ice maker for your family to install out by the pool, but probably not large enough to serve a party.
pros: Makes about twice as much ice as your standard household refrigerator
Does not require a drain for installation
Can be connected directly to a water source

customer_reviews.title: Ice in Texas!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been about a year since we purchased this Ice maker. I live inn Texas so trust me when I say we use a lot of ice. It makes so much Ice we sometimes have to empty it into bags. And very fast! It makes a little bit of noise but is hardly noticeable in my kitchen. My brother bought one that was rather expensive but this one was very reasonable and I couldn't be happier. It does require a water source but my husband, who is not a handyman, installed it in half a day.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D. Sanders......

customer_reviews.title: REVISED REVIEW - IT'S WORKING JUST FINE
customer_reviews.text: Original review: At first I thought this was going to be a great ice maker. I purchased it in July and it is now the end of August and it has quit making ice. As I did not keep the original box, I am unable to return it. Money down the drain. Do not purchase! REVISED REVIEW - turns out it needed to be unplugged and defrosted. Make sure after defrosting that the arm is completely down. There was very little ice build up on the side of the unit, but enough that I guess it was time. We had been putting it through some extensive use for about a week completely emptying it about 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand ice maker
customer_reviews.text: At first when I hooked up the ice maker it was working as expected, after about a month it continually jammed, stopped making ice. I need to frequently turn it off, wait a day and turn it back on. It may make a half a tray/container of per day but when I first started it was to full tray/container. If I could return it I would. There is no ice obstruction so that isn't the reason, it randomly fills throughout the day but it doesn't live up to what the manufacture says. I would purchase a product from a different make.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: Item broken when received. Water enters the ice cube ...
customer_reviews.text: Item broken when received. Water enters the ice cube tray and leaks out before it can freeze. Ice tray connection to the sidewall appears to be broken. Ice maker gets cold, but makes no ice cubes. This is the second we've purchased. First one worked overtime to provide ice for over 5 years. This one was bought with that in mind. Manufacturer has been contacted several times. Twice through Amazon, once by phone. No help..
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to other reviews
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were pretty mixed. Seems like sometimes the product works and sometimes it doesn't. We got the latter one. IF you buy this product, return it as soon as the compressor starts making a louder noise. For two months and two weeks, this thing banged out loads of ice (two weeks past the two month warranty for Whynter paying for shipping). I'm looking for something that is the same size since I altered my cabinet to fit this in. Avoid this thing unless you need it for only two months.
customer_reviews.author: jlclancy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!!! Has been plugged in and on for over a month and its amazing! This thing puts out some ice and it's the good ice too. However, I do foresee having to defrost it maybe every 2 months or so. No biggie, just turn off and put a towel inside as mentioned in previous reviews. Mine is outside in the humidity too, Louisiana!
customer_reviews.author: Tamron A.

customer_reviews.title: Product is inferior doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed and had Plummer connect the unit and water line. Unit cooked down and produced a small portion of ice cubes. After that, no more ice coming out. The unit makes a loud snapping noise every 20 minutes or so. I guess it’s the ice tray flipping over to dump ice cubes....... only there’s nothing in the tray and no ice coming out. Tried rebooting, checked water line and all connections. Total waste of money. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: katinthemirror

customer_reviews.title: Texas weather... now lots of Ice to cool it down!
customer_reviews.text: My new refrigerator has a tiny ice maker and after a while with the counter ice maker, I had to refill and replace every year, I decided to get this one and hook it up to the water line. We put a Brita filter on the line so we will always have clean filtered ice cubes. It's been going a few days and within hours it was full with a huge bucket of ice. It's a little noisy but no more than the refrigerator. I love that it keeps the ice frozen, unlike the counter top ones. We installed it under the counter due to the size and it is perfect. Stainless steel so matches all the other appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Making ice like a champ!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy the Kitchen Aide ice-maker... but it was $1500, spent $339 on this and it has been making buckets of ice ever since! Added the Watts inline filter (because the water comes from an outside source) and the ice tastes delicious. This sits on our patio (definitely not as cool as inside the house) but no problems so far (I did defrost it already... and that took hardly any time at all). Really happy with this purchase (and I use way more ice than I ever knew!!).
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fila

customer_reviews.title: Broken on Arrival - Avoid this company/product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, and installed it in my outdoor kitchen, to replace an older Whynter ice maker (same model) which had stopped working. However it showed up in a non working order, it never gets cold, and therefore never makes ice. I am currently trying to work with the manufacturer on a replacement unit or them sending a repair person, as I don’t want to have to ship this thing back unless I absolutely have to. Super frustrating, I am hoping they will surprise me with good customer service, but am not holding my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this one on June 20, 2019. This is the second one. Our first one was really reliable and ran great, so when it quit we ordered another. This second one has been as bad as the first was good. It ran incredible noisy from day one and now it has quit working all together. It actually started working worse and worse a couple of months ago. I defrosted it regularly so don't blame that. We need an ice maker, but it will not be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this ice maker for our houseboat. So far it has been great! It fills up overnight and keeps ice ready. It is not very loud, About the same as the refrigerator. We are very pleased. We are on the boat several days at a time, and we have been turning it off when we leave, so haven't had any defrosting issues. We also have been pleased that it runs flawlessly on the inverter when we are away from the dock. We have only had the ice maker for a few months so I can't speak to its longevity, but seems great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Petey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice very quick. You have to make sure to get the unit level otherwise you will here the motor running. The biggest complaint I have is you have to defrost the unit more than I think you should have too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ruks

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ice Machine ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 25 year old Uline in our RV. Bought this for our house in July 2018...it worked for 4 weeks - called manufacturer several times in Sept, Oct, Nov & Dec- finally received the replacement part as it was still under warranty. Installed the replacement part - the machine made about 3 trays of ice in 24 hour period - instead of filling up to 12 lbs of ice...we are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked out very well for me. When we built our house we had an ice maker like this installed in the custom cabinetry in our bar. I was worried when the old one failed I wouldn't be able to find another that would fit in the same hole. Presto! The dimensions stated on Amazon were exactly the same size as the old one. This unit makes ice fast and lots of it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to fridge ice maker.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am thrilled. Installed yesterday, and completely full today. Cubes are a great size. Connection line included is really long, so provides a lot of flexibility in placement. My Samsung fridge ice maker is terrible and have had 7 service calls already. This is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: We have actually purchased 2 of these. Both completely stopped working around 2 years. They freeze up every few days and need to be thawed and wiped out. I thought first one was a fluke so gambled again and lost. Install easy and looks nice... just not quality.
customer_reviews.author: ECF

customer_reviews.title: After hooking it up it works great. This may have been unusual or it may ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 stars because it works well after we fixed it. It was running louder than anticipated and it was very hot to the touch on the outside. We unplugged it and checked out the motor area to find out that the fan was never hooked up. After hooking it up it works great. This may have been unusual or it may be a consistent flaw in the manufacturing. Just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: BILILI

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for $300 the only thing I didn’t like was their installation hose it was soft and flimsy so I replaced it with a braided stainless steel hose the unit works well it did however freeze up once and had to fill it out but so far it works perfectly for units costing me four times as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCHED UNIT
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT A SCRATCHED UNIT WHICH I KNEW THAT IS WHAT I KNEW I WAS BUYING. BUT IT HAD FAR MORE DAMAGED THAN A SCRATCH. THE RIGHT FRONT FOOT WAS JAMMED UP INTO THE BOTTOM SO FAR THE UNIT COULD NOT BE LEVELED WITH OUT USING SHIM. GOT IT LEVELED BY USING SHIM AND THE GOOD PART IS I WORKS VERY WELL. ALSO THE SIDE WITH THE SCRATCH WAS BADLY WRINKLED.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cold Beer Machine
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases ever. Perfect size for the garage shelf next to cooler. -Size of a mini fridge. -Bucket holds about 7 lbs of ice. -Takes about 10 hours to fill bucket. -There is no drain line -Comes with water line and fitting for machine. You'll have to buy an adapter for 1/4 push lock to whatever your supply is. -Its pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E.

customer_reviews.title: If you need any ice, let me know
customer_reviews.text: W orks like a charm! We now have plenty of ice on these hot summer days!! The ice maker in our frige died of old age. I installed this unit in a kitchen cabinet and it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: A Value with clear RO quality ice!
customer_reviews.text: Has made quality ice now for more then three years as I hooked up the H20 line to my RO system. Has more then paid for itself as well. Only issue it makes noise after awhile sounds like a gridding noise.
customer_reviews.author: J Sona

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker is broken and dented. We hooked it up and it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bangeman

customer_reviews.title: Just installed
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good but pretty early to give it a solid review. The unit was relatively easy to install in spite of having to go through three cabinet walls before hookup. As of one day's use, the ice is flowing easily with plenty to meet my needs. I have an under-counter fridge with freezer in a downstairs location. I was frustrated by the need to go there for ice...no longer! I'm happy as a clam so far. Can't give it a 5-star at this early time but maybe later.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy! Ice arm sticks and doesn't make ice, freezer ices up after 1 week then when you defrost it there is water all over your floor. Very unsatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 days then issue after issue. Tried to contact manufacturer but no response. Would not recommend at al.
customer_reviews.author: jan pittman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice maker. This replaced a larger unit that died. It makes far more than 12 pounds a day. I empty a full bin twice a day into coolers. The only draw back is defrosting it. It tends to build frost pretty quick. In 30 days I had to defrost it but it took about an hour so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: aaluck

customer_reviews.title: Cool machine...pun intended
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Takes about a day for it to get into its groove,but once it does,the ice flows pretty quickly. We hooked it up to an extra washer valve downstairs with about $40 worth of fittings and flexible industrial ice maker hose. Super easy to install with minimal plumbing knowledge and super easy to use. I just hope it lasts for many years to come. I totally recommend it...the family is very happy and enjoying not going to the gas station to buy ice anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bauman

customer_reviews.title: No more running out of ice. If I still ...
customer_reviews.text: No more running out of ice. If I still owned a boat I'd buy another. Quick overnight recovery if I completely empty to fill an ice chest. Quiet compact and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Bought
customer_reviews.text: I'm going middle of road on rating since must rate, but I never bought this item!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this ice maker. It was an easy install, makes ice very quickly and keeps up with our moderately high demand. added 4/25/2018 - Have had this ice maker for over 2 years now and it is still pouring out ice very fast and have had no problems with it at all. Have now had this unit for 4 years and it is still working great like it did when new.
customer_reviews.author: Randy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a replacement ice maker and got this one. The first one we received didn’t work so we called Whytner customer service and spoke to Belle. She helped us problem solve and then sent us a replacement. The replacement works perfectly! Whytner was great to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Item
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item. This is my second UIM-155 Whynter Ice Maker. The are good while they last, but after about a year and a half the ice maker stop working. Why did I buy two? The first ice maker was insured. I didn't get insurance with the second one because I figure the firt failure was a fluke. Wrong. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Shipping companies will destroy the box, therefore ice maker will look like mine.
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker seems to work fine, but it arrived dented on both sides. Packaging needs to be improved because apparently the delivering companies don't care if it's damaged or not in shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An ice making MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: You want ice? You got it! This machine makes a bunch of it and fast. Compact and simple water line connection. One small flaw is that it doesn't trigger the stop bail well and actually makes too much ice and lots of times spills out when you remove the bin. But I wanted ice so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G Moore

customer_reviews.title: Ice Man
customer_reviews.text: I love the ice maker - best purchase this year.
customer_reviews.author: DBS

customer_reviews.title: lasted 5 days
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your time customer service sucks finally amazon covered and refunded me ! should last longer than 5 days
customer_reviews.author: tim mcpheron

customer_reviews.title: has worked well since purchase. Make sure to get ...
customer_reviews.text: has worked well since purchase. Make sure to get the door closed though- this thing is very cold and quickly freezes condensation from outside air. After almost a year with the ice maker, still going strong. Requires that I cycle it off occasionally to get rid of ice build up, due to folks in the office not getting the doors completely shut. The old model had a slot on the door to hang the ice scoop, this one does not which may be the reason the door doesn't get closed tightly. Ours is permanently hooked up over a drain and I never see condensation or melt.
customer_reviews.author: Sef

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality and I love the blue interior light. Have only had it running for a month, hopefully will last well which is my main concern.
customer_reviews.author: Joey44

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Ice
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is great. It makes lots of ice and fast. Perfect for a tight fit in a small area. And there price is right. Once the bin is full, the ice maker shuts off to save power. Quiet operation also.
customer_reviews.author: R. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Great little ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my cruiser and used full time in saltwater marine environment and it’s still running and making a full bin of ice in less than 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while but doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a year. Now it won't eject the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Quizzle

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after 1 month. Called the manufacturer multiple times and emailed with no help. Very poor customer service. They still have not returned my emails about a replacement. Do not by as they do not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a problem with my ice machine but Jenny A. with Whynter resolved everything and now it works perfectly. I definitely recommend buying products from Whynter as they have a customer first mindset.
customer_reviews.author: maddymopm

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My wife is an ice junkie
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My wife is an ice junkie. The fridge we have wouldn't make enough Ice for her needs. Received the item when they said, and This thing makes at least 12lbs a day
customer_reviews.author: Cuyler R Wood

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice quickly and in good volume.
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker works perfectly for our outdoor bar. Makes ice quickly and in good volume.
customer_reviews.author: kathy6091

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker works great after 3 months. Easy to set up and makes ice quickly. My only minor complaint is the door could maybe use a stronger magnet, have noticed the door open a couple times(only reason I don’t give it 5*) Now that I watch it, hasn’t been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Wonderful  price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good,right from the start.The price fit my budget.Have had several over past 35 years . This one is better than all others.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Great Ice maker. Needs defrost I g once in awhile. Great value and makes ice fast.
customer_reviews.author: Faith wilson

customer_reviews.title: This ice maker ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: We needed abundant daily ice (12 lbs) for our "Game Ready" physical therapy machine. I was able to easily install it under the utility sink without problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Mikelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby for Father's Day and it works great! No more running out of ice!!! The company is also easy to des with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hunibee23

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice for days and purrs like a kitten. Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine for the money.. You do have to defrost it periodically but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This particular unit quit working 10 months after I purchased it. Granted it was converted under the 12- month warranty. However, the warranty states that after 2 months the customer is responsible for the costs associated with shipping the item back for repair. Ups wanted $160 for shipping costs!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: Works good. However once in a while ice gets stuck. You have to reach in and pop it out and it will resume making. Works fast. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Weimer

customer_reviews.title: easily installed by me though instructions strongly suggest that a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built, performs well, easily installed by me though instructions strongly suggest that a certified plumber do the installation, likely for liability concerns. Makes great ice cubes in reasonable time frame, good quantity and quality. Met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: John R Warkentin

customer_reviews.title: We use this to fill up our cooler for weekend trips and it easily fills our medium size cooler with ice when there ...
customer_reviews.text: The first day of operation, a piece of ice got stuck in the unit and it stopped cycling ice which concerned me. I cleared the ice cube and have had no issues since (3 weeks). We use this to fill up our cooler for weekend trips and it easily fills our medium size cooler with ice when there are drinks in the cooler. We plan on buying 10lb ice bags and just fill up bags during the week to have more than enough ice. This unit will fill the bucket in a 24 hour period or less. If anything changes on its operation, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davenport

customer_reviews.title: I loved this ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I loved this ice maker. It made the ice that’s badass for mix drinks or for eating. Yep, I’m one of those like enjoys eating my ice. It was just not the correct size. Totally my fault. Measured wrong and due to some life changing events it was left in the box too long to return. I however did use it for a long time. Everyone loves the ice it made. It did not have a loud humming noise. It did not drop water. It wasn’t super heavy. Came with everything to install. Loved it. Just wrong size. If you chew ice this bad boy is for you pika peeps!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It does what is says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: It does what is says it will do. I have to say the ice is very think and melts quickly in drinks but all in all it ok
customer_reviews.author: Bbecca

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome and makes lots of ice really fast
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and makes lots of ice really fast. The only downside is it uses a lot of electricity to run. But for the pool area BBQ it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Good ice maker for pool bars
customer_reviews.text: Great ice maker. Holds up well outdoors at the pool bar - even with 100F weather, it's well insulated keeping ice cold. Won't be leaving it outdoors over the winter for obvious reasons. Knocked off a star because it is a little slow compared to my indoor fridge/freezer ice maker. It's able to keep up to small gatherings, but if you're going to have a larger group, you have to stock pile a few bags ahead of time. Not a huge deal, given it's not commercial grade. Works well - would buy again (hopefully I don't have to any time soon!)
customer_reviews.author: hammieo

customer_reviews.title: Good ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks good, fits under counter in kitchen and for the price it is a bargain. Makes really nice ice.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Augustus

customer_reviews.title: I personally liked the
customer_reviews.text: even though My wife returned it, I personally liked the maching
customer_reviews.author: richard williams

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It works sometimes but only 2 months and it's icing up and stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Funk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little unit so far. Not super fast at ice production, but ice quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Holter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine makes more ice that we can use. Better than the ice maker that was,in my freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk anybody buys this is crazy
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks I've had three of them their junk they leak air and Ice builds up around the door quickly they're noisy as hell they're real junk
customer_reviews.author: david dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Works great. Ice tray was full in under 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Votipka Farms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. Purchasing another one for work. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: The Plaza Salon

customer_reviews.title: Great icemaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a $1200 built in and it works great. An easy install for anyone that can install an icemaker line for their fridge.
customer_reviews.author: scott_mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Produces ice like mad!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it operational for a couple of weeks, but it is grand.....produces ice like mad!!! It was expensive to have it hooked up, but I am hoping it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: Whynter Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: makes lots of ice, but rather noisy. When I get the Speakeasy done and ice maker off the floor and in the cabinet, hope it will muffle some of the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ice maker, worked less than 3 weeks. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Michael Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Know you cannot return it as it’s considered hazardous
customer_reviews.text: The machine came broke and couldn’t be returned. Very disappointed. All I wanted was an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bolognese

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working is a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long, just over a year and stopped producing ice. Can not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Easy to install, no special tools needed, works just like it is supposed to. A note of caution, if you pull the basket out to get ice make sure when you put basket back in there is NO ICE behind it, otherwise the door will not close all the way an unit will frost up inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerben

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted 1 month and stopped working. I emailed the company but no response. I would NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: toss out the first few batches until your ice is clear as is recommended in the instructions
customer_reviews.text: We've used this at our club house for a month now, no problems so far. Installation was a breeze. On initial use, toss out the first few batches until your ice is clear as is recommended in the instructions. Ice does not stick together, even after sitting for several days.
customer_reviews.author: ron2714

customer_reviews.title: Works great and makes tons of ice
customer_reviews.text: Works great and makes tons of ice. Easy hook up, I used a saddle tap and it took less than thirty minutes.
customer_reviews.author: James Meyers

customer_reviews.title: lots of ice
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy install where previous icemaker was - makes ice quickly
customer_reviews.author: CLD

customer_reviews.title: It has been working fine for 3 weeks as of this review
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a standard ice maker you find in any freezer. Creates 3lbs of ice and stops... no drips, no problems. Unit is smaller than you might think, so small it might be a problem putting under a counter. Based on the next units up all have reviews of dying after 90 days - I stuck with this cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Only Complaint is the Noisy Compressor
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for a few weeks now and it's pretty decent little ice maker. The frost build up is minimal and I'm glad I bought an inline water filter for this. My only complaint is that it is noisy. I use my living room as my home office and its fairly open to the bar and dining room. The unit is under the bar in a cubby and I can hear it running with its low growl. I am going to put some foam in the cavity and try to cut down on the noise but it is very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: NO WORK THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: ANY BODY TO SUPPORT.... ANY.... DONT WORK.... NO ICE.... NO SUPPORT, BUT MY MONEY.... YES!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROGELI LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ice maker. Fits perfectly in my bar
customer_reviews.author: Benz

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Makes plenty of ice, not loud, puts out very little heat. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the Money !!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best you can expect too get for the Money. Auto Defrost would be nice but then you need a Drain and it Cost at least 3 Times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice quickly. Only problem is that it is a little noisy. Not enough of a problem to change the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: If you need Ice.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is made to do. Price is fair. could make less noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the convenience of having an Ice Maker...what can I say, I LOVE IT!!!!! It took me a while to get it set up (having some kitchen remodeling done) but once it was in, made the ice quickly and was ready to use ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my office and the machine is superlative in every way. A few of the previous reviews made me hesitate but I am so very happy that I ordered it anyway. We go through a large amount of ice every day, seven days a week, and have never run out. I cannot recommend this product highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: MHW

customer_reviews.title: Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: this product makes ice constantly if needed. It is very quiet. We bought it for my Mom and she loves it. It does stop when full. I may buy a second one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: tbm1953

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: I installed this ice maker myself. Do not even attempt to use the fittings that come with the machine. Do yourself a favor and buy a braided stainless steel water line with 1/4 inch fittings on each side for less than $20 no matter the length. I've been getting good ice for over a month now. The machine Is quieter than my wine refrigerator, and the noise level is not an issue. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Guidiamo

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes a full bucket in about three hours. I do have to defrost from time to time but other than that great. Very quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Came dented but works A little loud when making
customer_reviews.text: Came dented but works A little loud when making ice
customer_reviews.author: Holly Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Sweeeeeet!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stand alone ice maker!! Makes plenty of ice for us, a family of 4, always on the go with kids sports and filling coolers. Very quiet, even standing right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: no ice for us!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a good little icemaker if it had lasted more then 18 months. Compressor quit. Will have to just through it away. No one will work on it. Chinese parts are impossible to get.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy anything from unbeatable sales!!! They are a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Bcallaway03

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and Miserable Warranty
customer_reviews.text: We used this icemaker for two months - with very light useage. It stopped working after that. In order to get warranty service you need to ship it back to the manufacturer and pay the shipping. The cost of that is prohibitive. I purchased the extended warranty and that was useless. In short, we have a useless machine and wasted money. Stay away from this product and stay away from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A moren

customer_reviews.title: it works great. BUT
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works great. BUT, ice is constantly getting stuck in the mechanism and won't allow it to function properly. My husband keeps a screwdriver next to it, in order to dislodge the stuck piece. Disappointing. If I would have bought from a store, I would return it. Since it was online, I'll keep it and be frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whynter UIM-155 Stainless Steel Built-In Ice Maker
product_meta.description: Style:Ice MakerWith the Whynter stainless steel built-in ice maker, we bring you the latest in professional standard innovations for the home. This ice maker makes 12 lbs of crescent-shaped in 24 hours and can store 6 lbs of ice. This built-in portable ice maker from Whynter is the perfect solution to your ice Making needs in virtually any situation. It comes in a stylish stainless steel door and sleek black cabinet that complements any modern kitchen and bar area.
feature_bullets: Built-in or freestanding installation (front venting) with no drain required
Makes 12 lbs of crescent-shaped ice cubes in 24 hours
Sleek stainless steel door and black cabinet, ice scoop and ice bin included
Stores up to 6 lbs of ice, auto shut-off when ice bin is full. Power consumption-120 W
25 foot 1/4-inch food grade water line connection included.Rated current: 1.8 A

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars239 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
